title: Type ID - Please
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330054939im_/http:/typophile.com/cms/files/saima-says-alia-designs-head_4165.jpg)

It looks SO familiar but I can’t figure it out.

I’d like some help IDing the sans serif font that is used for “The marriage of their daughter...”

Thank you!

 [‹ Diana Krall Quiet Nights typeface/lettering identification](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330054939/http:/typophile.com/cms/node/56304 "Go to previous forum topic") [Vera Wang serif wedding invitation typeface -- HELP! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330054939/http:/typophile.com/cms/node/56323 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pakcola

comments.content:
I think it’s Gotham Light, but it’s pretty blurry so hard to be sure.

And the serif is Mrs. Eaves, but presumably you already knew that :)
